text: Dedrick D. Gobert (born Dedrick Dwayne Fontenot; November 25, 1971 - November 19, 1994) was an American actor. He was best known for his roles in the John Singleton movies Boyz n the Hood (1991), Poetic Justice (1993), and Higher Learning (1995). He was born in Shreveport, Louisiana. Gobert was murdered on November 19, 1994 in Mira Loma, California. He was 22. ==Other websites== * Category:1971 births Category:1994 deaths Category:Actors from Louisiana Category:African-American movie actors Category:Murdered African-American people Category:Murders by firearm in California Category:Actors from Shreveport, Louisiana Category:People murdered in California
title: Dedrick D. Gobert
